problem.markdown:
Approximately how many minutes of (auditory) data does ALIZE need to get a "hit" and recognize a speaker's voice?
( ) ~ 5 minutes (x) ~ 20 minutes ( ) ~ 1 hour ( ) ~ 1.5 hours
problem.p: Approximately how many minutes of (auditory) data does ALIZE need to get a "hit" and recognize a speaker's voice?
